## GraphStructure.incoming property

Backward adjacency list: nodeId -<!-- -->&gt; all input connections to this node

**Signature:**

```typescript
incoming: Record<number, NodeConnection[]>;
```

## Remarks

Used to quickly find which nodes provide data to a given node
